casebody.head_matter:
Kolber, Appellant, v. Pickens.
Argued April 17, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Samuel P. Lavine, with him Steinberg, Greenstein, Riehman & Price, for appellant.
Marvin D. Weintraub, with him J. Raymond Kremer, and Kremer, Krimshy & Luterman, for appellees.
May 21, 1968:
